name: The Distortion Beast
summary:
In sleepy Coppersfield, a remote village on the coast of the Axelands, Maria of Cardo is offered a job. Coppersfield has been plagued by terrible attacks from an insidious and monstrous creature they call The Distortion Beast. The village elders want Maria of Cardo to explore the beat's lair, find it, and destroy it once and for all.

As Maria of Cardo, can you make the right choices, and truly defeat The Distortion Beast?

--

The Distortion Beast is an interactive fiction comic. Become Maria of Cardo, an adventurer who dives into the Lair of the Distortion Beast to rid the Axelands of this menace once and for all. Collect items, make choices, and try to defeat the beast!
